  • Method Details

    • startClient

      public void startClient​(int port, java.lang.String IP, boolean GUI)
      Starts the client and asks the view for the player's name and the number of players in the match
      Parameters:
      port - server port
      IP - server IP
      GUI - true for GUI, false for CLI

    • onError

      Asks the view to display a fatal error message

      public void onUpdateInitializeWorkerPositions​(SerializableUpdateInitializeWorkerPositions object)
      Saves and shows the workers' initial Position
      Parameters:
      object - received from the server; holds the information with workersPositions and the playerID

    • onUpdateInitializeGodPower

    • onRequestInitializeGodPower

      public void onRequestInitializeGodPower​(SerializableRequestInitializeGodPower object) throws org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
      Asks the view for the godPower
      Parameters:
      object - received from the server; holds the information with the possible godPowers for the player to choose from and the playerID
      Throws:
      org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - ParseException

    • onRequestInitializeWorkerPositions

      public void onRequestInitializeWorkerPositions​(SerializableRequestInitializeWorkerPositions object)
      Asks the view for the initial workers' Position
      Parameters:
      object - received from the server; holds the information with the possibles workersPositions and the playerID

    • onUpdateDisconnection

      public void onUpdateDisconnection​(SerializableUpdateDisconnection object) throws java.lang.Exception
      Handles a disconnection and terminates the game session
      Parameters:
      object - received from the server; holds the information with the playerID
      Throws:
      GameEndedException - if an opponent disconnected
      java.lang.Exception - if server decides to throw client out of the game; this behaviour should never happen and it's symptom of unexpected error

    • onRequestAction

      public void onRequestAction​(SerializableRequestAction object)
      Asks the player to perform an action
      Parameters:
      object - received from the server; holds the information for possible moves or builds and proprieties of the workers

    • onUpdateWinner

      Parameters:
      object - received from the server; holds the information with the playerID
      Throws:
      GameEndedException - //TODO add throw

    • onUpdateTurn

      Handles the new turn
      Parameters:

    • onRestart

      public void onRestart​(int error) throws GameEndedException
      Displays an error and then restarts the client
      Parameters:
      error - error ID
      Throws:
      GameEndedException - thrown to stop current ClientCommunicator process before starting a new one

      Specified by:
      onCompletedBuild in interface ViewObserver
      Parameters:
      position - the Position of the new building
      workerId - the worker ID of the worker tha built
      isDome - true if the building is a dome
